thread.title: Operation Fiela descends on Mitchell's Plain
thread.title_full: Operation Fiela descends on Mitchell's Plain | News24

author: news24.com
title: Operation Fiela descends on Mitchell's Plain
text:
Cape Town - Fifteen people are expected in the Mitchell's Plain Magistrate's Court shortly, after they were arrested in an Operation Fiela crackdown in Eastridge, Cape Town, on Thursday.
Police spokesperson Captain FC van Wyk said in a statement that officers focused on guns, drugs, gangs and wanted suspects during the special operation, which took place between 01:30 and 10:00.
During the operation 57 properties, 40 vehicles and 207 people were searched, he said.
"At about 02:42, the members [executed] a search warrant at a house in Zebra Crescent, Eastridge. They recovered a Nicro 9mm pistol with a magazine with four rounds of ammunition," Van Wyk said.
